author: Tim Hume, VICE News
title: Trump Just Bullied India Into Allowing Exports of His Favorite Unproven Coronavirus Wonder Drug
description: “I said, 'We’d appreciate your allowing our supply to come out.' If he doesn’t allow it to come out, that would be OK, but of course, there may be retaliation."
content: Indias government lifted an export ban on hydroxychloroquine, an anti-malaria drug that President Donald Trump has been aggressively hyping as a potential coronavirus miracle cure, just days after the U.S. president threatened retaliation unless India release… [+4055 chars]
